thresholds.description: Based on the demands of time constraints and challenging data formats, this project seems large and fairly complex technically. Plan to invest significant resources for it to be successful.
Based on the demands of time constraints and data formats, this project seems moderately ambitious. Plan to invest significant resources for it to be successful.
Based on the demands of time constraints and data formats, this project seems smaller in scope. A small team should be able to complete it with sufficient time and access to technical resources.
